title: Search Advertising Transaction Property
description: Search Advertising Transaction Class includes fields that defines Transaction.

searchads:recordId.title: Unique record Id
searchads:recordId.description: Unique record Id for <UserId, PropertyId> tuple

searchads:createDate.description: The date and time when the transaction was created. An example form is "2004-10-23T12:00:00-06:00".

searchads:modifyDate.description: The date and time when the transaction was last modified. An example form is "2004-10-23T12:00:00-06:00".
